verses.name: Matthew 14:22
verses.text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship, and to go before him unto the other side, while he sent the multitudes away.

verses.name: Matthew 14:23
verses.text: And when he had sent the multitudes away, he went up into a mountain apart to pray: and when the evening was come, he was there alone.

verses.name: Matthew 14:24
verses.text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea, tossed with waves: for the wind was contrary.

verses.name: Matthew 14:25
verses.text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them, walking on the sea.
